"Error: Unable to enable 3D Acceleration. " + RendererType + " will not be enabled.

"

"When playback of a TV recording ends, SageTV can ask if you would like to delete that recording.\n "
"This question can be shown a) for recordings that SageTV is not allowed to delete, such as Manual Recordings or Favorites with AutoDelete turned off, b) after every recording, or c) never.\n "

Action.Name:
"Would you like SageTV to rescan your entire library and redo the format detection and metadata importing?

"You may want to disable this option if newly added channels are often not viewable on your system.\n \n"
"REM Change the setting & close the menu."

"While 3D Acceleration is enabled, do you want SageTV to use exclusive mode when SageTV is displayed Full Screen?
 
Note: This option may not work with all video cards. If you try this setting and have playback problems, turn this option off.

"Do you want to force a channel tuning event for each recording even if the next recording is on the same channel as the previous recording?

 "

"Some airings have non-unique IDs, causing SageTV to be unable to easily distinguish whether they are actually all the same show or different episodes of that show.

 "

Action.Name: "REM Find dir containing ImageFile & assign it to ImageDir. Look in the list of parent themes + the STV dir."
"REM See if this image file has been remapped to be the same as another image."
DebugLog( "Remapped image \"" + ImageFile + "\" to be the same as \"" + RemapImageFile + "\"" )
"REM Check each path in the list of parent themes."
DebugLog( "Themed image: Found \"" + ImageFile + "\" in " + ImageDir )
DebugLog( "The default theme set is \"" + ThisTheme + "\"" )
"REM BG for Info area & similar types of panels."
"REM Load ThisTheme's properties to get its parent theme."
"REM Store this theme name & its path."
"REM Get this theme's parent theme, if there is one."
"REM Open property file. Send PropFilePath and PropFileDefault (use null for no default). Assign to PropFile variable"
"REM Create the property list, with optional default values"
"REM Open the property file and load its contents"
DebugLog( "FAILED properties does not exist: " + PropFilePath )
"REM If this theme is the default or if it is its own parent or if too many themes have been checked, then the list of themes is done."
"REM Add the STV's directory to the list of paths to check for images."
DebugLog( "The parent theme for \"" + ThisTheme + "\" is: \"" + ParentTheme + "\"" )
"REM The parent theme is different & is not the default theme, so check for its parent."
"REM Done with all theme info loading, so mark as done & reload the current menu, if needed"
"REM General purpose Menu/Panel BG fills & borders."
"REM Images to be used for drawing lines."
"REM BG & Border for shaded border cells."
"REM Get the text colors and alphas to go with this wide menu button"
"REM Set dirs to search for images"
"REM Other Recording Marker (Not MR or Fav)"
"REM Various color and alpha settings, along with images to replace shapes."
"REM Get the basic text colors and alphas"
"REM Get the basic text shadow colors and alphas"
"REM Get the outline colors for various recording types"
"REM Get the weather-specific text colors and alphas"
"REM Get the guide grid default BG fill color & cell borders"
"REM Default BG color for airings w/o colors for categories."
"REM Get the fill colors for various panels."
"REM Loop through all the themes, starting at the end of the list (the overall parent), using each one as the new default property set."
DebugLog( "The \"" + CurTheme + "\" theme consists of " + Size(gThemeParentList) + " themes: " + gThemeParentList )
DebugLog( "The \"" + CurTheme + "\" theme uses " + Size(gThemeImagePathList) + " image paths: " + gThemeImagePathList )
"REM Create the theme properties, with all the parent themes as the defaults."
"REM We now have an overall set of properties for this theme."
"REM Button Highlight and Normal BG for malore custom menus"
"REM Get the list of parent themes & their paths."
"REM Get thumb text colors and alphas to go over the thumbnail button with an overlay - Primary text"
"REM Category bar for online videos & so on."
"REM Get the text colors and alphas to go with the category bar button"
"REM enable plugin manager auto check for updates"
"REM Get the text colors and alphas to go with this narrow menu button"
"REM Various square corner overlay images for recording status"
"REM Get the text colors and alphas to go with the standard button"
"REM Get light text colors and alphas to go with the standard button"
"REM Get light text colors and alphas to go with online video feed buttons w/o thumbnails"
"REM Get light text colors and alphas to go with the import-marked button"
"REM Button images for multi-column thumbnail buttons."
"REM Overlay to go over standard button, shown on top of a thumbnail in multi-column mode."
"REM Get thumb text colors and alphas to go over the thumbnail button w/o an overlay"
"REM Get thumb text colors and alphas to go over the thumbnail button with an overlay - Secondary text"
"REM Get the text colors and alphas to go with the malore button"
"REM Set a few variables to be used throughout."
"REM Prohibit STVs to load or import."
"REM STVI Plugin Manager should check for update, if that is enabled."
"REM If using an HD200 with newer firmware & haven't done so already, set music playback to use visualizations."
"REM Set visualization setting to graphics if firmware is new enough."
"REM Various rounded corner overlay images for recording status"
"REM Load and set all global info for the current theme. When done, the menu cache will be cleared and the current menu will be reloaded, if needed."
DebugLog( "Loading all \"" + GetProperty(gCurrentThemePropName, gDefaultThemeName ) + "\" theme settings..." )
"REM Set some global vars for the theme system"
"REM Airing, status, and other types of markers"
"REM File Browser Jump to Root Filesystem icon"
"REM Scroll to Table position of mouse action"
"REM Scroll to Table position of mouse action"
